job.description: pstrong100 REMOTEstrongppbrppWere looking for a Machine Learning Data Engineer with an affinity for machine learning infrastructure and model development Excellent opportunity to work for a leading eCommerce organization in a role with full remote flexibilityppbrppstrongResponsibilities of the Machine Learning Data EngineerstrongppbrpulliPrototype and research ML featuresliliDrive ML solutions in Spark and Tensorflow to productionliliPresent and communicate internally and externallyliliParticipate in continuous improvement of teams engineering processes and infrastructureliliMentor and coach junior engineers and participate in code and design reviewsliulpbrppstrongRequirements of the Machine Learning Data EngineerstrongppbrpulliDemonstrated ability to analyze large data sets and identify gapsliliAbility to design and deploy solutions in a Hadoop environmentliliProficiency in Java and Linux environmentsliliBasic ML knowledgeliulpbrppKeywords Data Engineer Machine Learning ML Spark Tensorflow eCommerce 100 RemoteppbrppJob ID 352986p
